description.en: Teaching in the speciality at the primary, secondary or vocation level and application of methods of the speciality in practice.
description.et: Aine sisuks on erialase õppetöö läbiviimine üldharidus- või kutsekooli tasandil ja erialase metoodika rakendamine praktikas.

objectives.en: The aim of teaching practice is to give students the experience of teaching mathematics at an institution of primary, secondary or vocational education.

learning_outcomes.en: Students acquire the ability to plan the content of, choose appropriate literature and methods of teaching and assessment for a primary, secondary or vocational mathematics course; acquire the experience of leading school lessons, reading and assessing student writing; improve their skills of oral presentation, leadership and conflict resolution; acquire independence in teaching and supervising pupils.

description.et:
1) aruanne praktikast
2) praktikabaasi poolse juhendaja arvamus
3) vestlus aine vastutava õppejõuga

grade_preconditions.et: Anda tuleb vähemalt 6 kontakttundi matemaatika õpetamist üldharidus- või kutsekoolis.

grade_evaluation.et: Kõik juhendaja poolt antud ülesanded nõutaval tasemel tehtud.
